protein.specific_function: Phosphorylates microtubule-associated protein 2 (MAP2). May promote entry in the cell cycle

go_class.description: receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity

reference.reference_text: Gonzalez FA, Raden DL, Rigby MR, Davis RJ: Heterogeneous expression of four MAP kinase isoforms in human tissues. FEBS Lett. 1992 Jun 15;304(2-3):170-8.
